may add their {s} to another chosen character's
{s} this turn.)

Name: Chef Louis - In Over His Head
Flavor_Text:
"When added to a clear soup, the pale, triple-
pointed leaves of Trispiritus can have a restorative
effect. CAUTION: DO NOT confuse it with Three
Thorns, which causes itchy rashes."
-Hana's Herborium

Name: Daisy Duck - Ghost Finder
Flavor_Text:
"If I'm reading this right, these aren't actually ghosts
at all! Boy, you're lucky I came along on this one."

Name: Cri-Kee - Good Luck Charm
Flavor_Text:
"Small glimmers may feel safe in the jungle
around the Mysterious Ruins, where they can
easily go unnoticed."
-Hana's Herborium
Body_Text:
Alert (This character can challenge as if they had
Evasive.)

Name: Rapunzel - Creative Captor
Flavor_Text: "Well, that should slow you down for a minute."
Body_Text:
ENSNARL: When you play this character, chosen
opposing character gets -3 {s} this turn.

Name: Fergus McDuck - Scrooge's Father
Flavor_Text:
"Ach, close the secret entrance! You're letting all
the mysterious air out!"
Body_Text:
TOUGHEN UP: When you play this character,
chosen character of yours gains Ward until the
start of your next turn. (Opponents can't choose
them except to challenge.)

Name: Li Shang - Seasoned Strategist
Flavor_Text:
The sound of hoofbeats filled the air. Li Shang
moved his men into position, ready to turn the
tables on their pursuer.

Name: Genie - Investigative Mind
Flavor_Text:
"You know, most books are a lot more compelling
when you read the pages in order..."

Name: Scuttle - Birdbrained
Flavor_Text: "Whoa! The wind's all of a sudden on the move here."
Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except
to challenge.)

Name: Ichabod Crane - Bookish Schoolmaster
Body_Text:
WELL-READ: Whenever this character quests, if
you've played a character with cost 5 or more
this turn, put the top card of your deck into your
inkwell facedown and exerted.

Name: Jasmine - Soothing Princess
Body_Text:
Boost 2 {i} (Once during your turn, you may pay
2 {i} to put the top card of your deck facedown
under this character.)
UPLIFTING AURA Whenever this character
quests, if there's a card under her, remove up to 3
damage from each of your characters.

Name: Judy Hopps - Lead Detective
Body_Text:
Shift 4 {i} (You may pay 4 {i} to play this on top of
one of your characters named Judy Hopps.)
LATERAL THINKING During your turn, your
Detective characters gain Alert and Resist +2.
(They can challenge as if they had Evasive.
Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

Name: The Sultan - Playful Monarch
Flavor_Text:
Never mind what the Curator intended these
trinkets for; the sultan found his own use for them
soon enough.

Name: Ichabod Crane - Scared Out of His Mind
Flavor_Text:
"Every small detail in Brom's awful story returned
to haunt his recollection."
-Narrator
Body_Text:
CHILLING TALE: When this character is banished,
you may put this card into your inkwell facedown
and exerted.

Name: Scar - Eerily Prepared
Body_Text:
Boost 2 {i} (Once during your turn, you may pay
2 {i} to put the top card of your deck facedown
under this character.)
SURVIVAL OF THE FITTEST Whenever you put
a card under this character, chosen opposing
character gets -5 {s} this turn.

Name: Daisy Duck - Paranormal Investigator
Body_Text:
Shift 4 {i} (You may pay 4 {i} to play this on top of one
of your characters named Daisy Duck.)
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add
their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)
STRANGE HAPPENINGS While this character is exerted,
cards enter opponents' inkwells exerted.

Name: Cinderella - Dream Come True
Body_Text:
WHATEVER YOU WISH FOR: At the end of your turn,
if you played a Princess character this turn, you
may put a card from your hand into your inkwell
facedown to draw a card.

Name: Judy Hopps - Uncovering Clues
Body_Text:
THOROUGH INVESTIGATION: When you play this
character and whenever she quests, look at
the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal a
Detective character card and put it into your
hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in
any order.

Name: Pluto - Clever Cluefinder
Flavor_Text: Every detective can use an assistant to sniff out clues.
Body_Text:
ON THE TRAIL: {e} - If you have a Detective character
in play, return an item card from your discard to your
hand. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

Name: Daisy Duck - Sapphire Champion
Body_Text:
STAND FAST: Your other Sapphire characters gain
Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)
LOOK AHEAD Whenever one of your other
Sapphire characters quests, you may look at the
top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or
the bottom of your deck.

Name: Kristoff - Mining the Ruins
Body_Text:
Boost 1 {i} (Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {i}
to put the top card of your deck facedown under this
character.)
WORTH MINING Whenever this character quests,
if there's a card under him, put the top card of your
deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

Name: Mickey Mouse - Detective
Flavor_Text:
The clues all pointed toward ghosts, but he knew
there was something more going on here.
Body_Text:
GET A CLUE: When you play this character, you
may put the top card of your deck into your
inkwell facedown and exerted.

Name: Hen Wen's Visions
Flavor_Text:
"Hen Wen, from you I do beseech
Knowledge that lies beyond my reach..."
-Taran
Body_Text:
Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Put 1 on the top
of your deck and the rest on the bottom in any order.

Name: Promising Lead
Flavor_Text:
"The books on these pages match up with those shelves. And the
ley lines...The answer's right here!"
-Judy Hopps
Body_Text:
Chosen character gets +1  ![[imagenes/lore.svg|20]] and gains Support this turn.
(Whenever they quest, you may add their {s} to another chosen
character's {s} this turn.)

Name: Might Solve a Mystery
Body_Text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {e} to sing this
song for free.)
Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal
up to 1 character card and up to 1 item card and put
them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of
your deck in any order.

Name: Sudden Scare
Body_Text:
Put chosen opposing character into their player's
inkwell facedown. That player puts the top card of
their deck into their inkwell facedown.

Name: Spooky Sight
Flavor_Text:
"We've got to get out of here!"
-Mickey Mouse
Body_Text:
Put all characters with cost 3 or less into their players'
inkwells facedown and exerted.

Name: Detective's Badge
Flavor_Text:
"It's not just a badge. It's who we are. There's no greater honor."
-Detective Judy Hopps
Body_Text:
PROTECT AND SERVE: {e}, 1 {i} - Chosen character gains Resist +1
and the Detective classification until the start of your next turn.
(Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

Name: Ink Amplifier
Flavor_Text:
With a crackle of energy, the strange device lit up when
the glimmers entered the study.
Body_Text:
ENERGY CAPTURE: Whenever an opponent draws a card
during their turn, if it's the second card they've drawn
this turn, you may put the top card of your deck into
your inkwell facedown and exerted.

Name: Fairy Godmother's Wand
Flavor_Text: Sometimes a glimpse is all you need.
Body_Text:
ONLY TILL MIDNIGHT: During your turn, whenever you
put a card into your inkwell, chosen Princess character
of yours gains Ward until the start of your next turn.
(Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

Name: Inkrunner
Body_Text:
PREFLIGHT CHECK: When you play this item, draw a card.
READY TO RIDE {e}, 1 {i} - Chosen character gains Alert
this turn. (They can challenge as if they had Evasive.)

Name: Castle of the Horned King - Bastion of Evil
Body_Text:
INTO THE GLOOM: Once during your turn, whenever a character quests
while here, you may ready chosen item.

Name: Robin Hood - Ephemeral Archer
Body_Text:
Boost 1 {i} (Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {i}
to put the top card of your deck facedown under this
character.)
EXPERT SHOT Whenever this character quests, if
there's a card under him, deal 1 damage to up to 2
chosen characters.

Name: Donald Duck - Ghost Hunter
Flavor_Text:
"Let's show those rotten ghosts who's in charge!
You go first."
Body_Text:
RAISE A RUCKUS: When you play this character,
chosen Detective character gains Challenger +2
this turn. (They get +2 {s} while challenging.)

Name: Goliath - Clan Leader
Body_Text:
DUSK TO DAWN: At the end of each player's turn, if they
have more than 2 cards in their hand, they choose and
discard cards until they have 2. If they have fewer than 2
cards in their hand, they draw until they have 2.
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand,
this character can't ready.

Name: The Headless Horseman - Cursed Rider
Body_Text:
Shift 5 {i} (You may pay 5 {i} to play this on top of one of
your characters named The Headless Horseman.)
WITCHING HOUR When you play this character, each
player draws 3 cards, then discards 3 cards at random.
Choose an opposing character and deal 2 damage to
them for each action card discarded this way.

Name: Clawhauser - Donut Detective
Flavor_Text:
It was only a crumb, but Clawhauser knew it was a
small piece of a larger mystery.
Body_Text:
Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character
gets +2 {s}.)

Name: Francine - Eyeing the Evidence
Flavor_Text:
Francine stared at the torn page, trying to take
her mind off Higgins and his pursuit of the littering
mastermind. Was he ready for the danger of
undercover work?
Body_Text:
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is
reduced by 1.)

Name: Inspector Tezuka - Resolute Officer
Flavor_Text:
"Stand back. I'll handle this."
-Inspector Tezuka
Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted.
An opposing character who challenges one of
your characters must choose one with Bodyguard
if able.)

Name: Nick Wilde - Sly Fox Sleuth
Flavor_Text:
"Okay, Nick, it's time to use those superior sleuthing
skills to find a way out of this. Wait, why am I talking to
myself?"

Name: Basil - Tenacious Mouse
Flavor_Text: "It's time to make a stand!"
Body_Text:
HOLD YOUR GROUND: Whenever you play another
Detective character, this character gains Resist +1
until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to
them is reduced by 1.)

Name: Hudson - Determined Reader
Body_Text:
FINDING ANSWERS: When you play this character,
you may draw a card, then choose and discard
a card.
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your
hand, this character can't ready.

Name: Minnie Mouse - Ghost Hunter
Flavor_Text:
It's hard to catch a ghost without going somewhere
spooky.
Body_Text:
SEARCH THE SHADOWS: When you play this
character, chosen Detective character gains Alert
this turn. (They can challenge as if they had Evasive.)

Name: Black Heron - Real Bad Egg
Flavor_Text:
"You may have bested me before, McDuck, but
not this time!"

Name: Lexington - Small in Stature
Body_Text:
Alert (This character can challenge as if they
had Evasive.)
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your
hand, this character can't ready.

Name: David Xanatos - Steel Clan Leader
Flavor_Text:
"A plan only fails when you don't learn from it. And my
plans never fail."
-David Xanatos
Body_Text:
MINOR INCONVENIENCE: When you play this character,
you may choose and discard a card to deal 2 damage to
chosen character.

Name: Chief Bogo - Calling the Shots
Body_Text:
MY JURISDICTION: During your turn, this
character can't be dealt damage.
DEPUTIZE Your other characters gain the
Detective classification.

Name: The Twins - Lost Boys
Flavor_Text:
"Hooray! A whole new forest to be lost in!"
"Yeah, lost in!"
Body_Text:
TWO FOR ONE: When you play this character,
if you have a location in play, you may deal 2
damage to chosen character.

Name: Nick Wilde - Persistent Investigator
Body_Text:
Shift 3 {i} (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of
one of your characters named Nick Wilde.)
CASE CLOSED During your turn, whenever one
of your Detective characters banishes another
character in a challenge, draw a card.

Name: Mayor Winddancer - Actor-Turned-Politician
Flavor_Text:
It's the role of a lifetime, and it'll take every bit
of his considerable charm and fabulous mane to
get it right.

Name: Prince Charming - Protector of the Realm
Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play
exerted. An opposing character who challenges
one of your characters must choose one with
Bodyguard if able.)
PROTECTIVE PRESENCE Each turn, only one
character can challenge.

Name: Broadway - Sturdy and Strong
Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play
exerted. An opposing character who challenges
one of your characters must choose one with
Bodyguard if able.)
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your
hand, this character can't ready.

Name: Pluto - Steel Champion
Body_Text:
WINNER TAKE ALL: During your turn, whenever
one of your other Steel characters banishes
another character in a challenge, gain 2 lore.
MAKE ROOM Whenever you play another Steel
character, you may banish chosen item.

Name: Fairy Godmother - Magical Benefactor
Body_Text:
Boost 3 {i} (Once during your turn, you may pay 3 {i} to put
the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
STUNNING TRANSFORMATION Whenever you put a card
under this character, you may banish chosen opposing
character. If you do, their player may reveal the top card
of their deck. If that card is a character or item card, they
may play it for free. Otherwise, they put it on the bottom of
their deck.

Name: Zeus - Missing His Spark
Body_Text:
Boost 2 {i} (Once during your turn, you may pay
2 {i} to put the top card of your deck facedown
under this character.)
I NEED MORE THUNDERBOLTS! While there's a card
under this character, he gets +2 {s} and +2 {w}.

Name: The Headless Horseman - Relentless Spirit
Flavor_Text: If you hear hoofbeats in the dark, don't look back.
Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted.
An opposing character who challenges one of
your characters must choose one with Bodyguard
if able.)

Name: But I'm Much Faster
Body_Text:
(A character with cost 1 or more can {e} to sing this song
for free.)
Chosen character gains Alert and Challenger +2 this
turn. (They can challenge as if they had Evasive. They
get +2 {s} while challenging.)

Name: Putting It All Together
Flavor_Text:
"Okay, so the ghostly glimmers were first seen here,
and the trail of torn lorebook pages started in this part
of the Illuminary..."
-Judy Hopps
Body_Text:
Chosen opposing character can't challenge during
their next turn. Draw a card.

Name: He Hurled His Thunderbolt
Body_Text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {e} to sing this
song for free.)
Deal 4 damage to chosen character. Your Deity
characters gain Challenger +2 this turn. (They get
+2 {s} while challenging.)

Name: The Game's Afoot!
Flavor_Text:
"We've not a moment to lose!"
-Basil
Body_Text:
Move up to 2 of your characters to the same location for free.
That location gains Resist +2 until the start of your next turn.
(Damage dealt to it is reduced by 2.)

Name: The Robot Queen
Flavor_Text:
"To our beloved Queen this gift we send,
As her 60-year reign comes to an end."
-Note delivered with the robot queen
Body_Text:
MAJOR MALFUNCTION: Whenever you play a character,
you may pay 1 {i} and banish this item to deal 2 damage to
chosen character.

Name: The Sword of Hercules
Body_Text:
MIGHTY HIT: When you play this item, banish chosen
opposing Deity character.
HAND-TO-HAND During your turn, whenever one
of your characters banishes another character in a
challenge, gain 1 lore.

Name: Ingenious Device
Body_Text:
SURPRISE PACKAGE: {e}, 2 {i}, Banish this item - Draw a
card, then choose and discard a card.
TIME GROWS SHORT During your turn, when this item
is banished, deal 3 damage to chosen character or
location.

Name: Illuminary Tunnels - Linked Caverns
Body_Text:
SUBTERRANEAN NETWORK: While you have a character here, this location gets
+1  ![[imagenes/lore.svg|20]] for each other location you have in play.
LOCUS While you have a character here, you pay 1 {i} less to play locations.

Name: Zootopia - Police Headquarters
Body_Text:
NEW INFORMATION: Once during your turn, whenever you move a
character here, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

Name: Castle Wyvern - Above the Clouds
Body_Text:
PROTECT THIS CASTLE: Characters gain Challenger +1 and Resist +1
while here. (They get +1 {s} while challenging. Damage dealt to them is
reduced by 1.)
